item.title: CVE-2023-3000|2024-08-02T06:41:04.148Z -- erikoglu%20technology -- ermon
item.description: Improper Neutralization of Special Elements used in an SQL Command ('SQL Injection') vulnerability in Erikoglu Technology ErMon allows Command Line Execution through SQL Injection, Authentication Bypass.This issue affects ErMon: before 230602.
